trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about an event across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Definierar ett kontrakt som komponenter kan använda för att komma åt information om en händelse över programmet domän och processen gränser.

trans-unit.source: An IRemoteEventInfoContract provides information about an event of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: En IRemoteEventInfoContract innehåller information om en händelse för en fjärr-objekt som implementerar det <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>gränssnittet.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>

trans-unit.source: To access one or more events of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: För att komma åt en eller flera händelser i ett fjärrobjekt använder den <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>metod för att hämta en <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>som motsvarar typ av fjärrobjektet.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar den metod som användes för att lägga till en händelsehanterare delegera till händelsen som den här <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifierar.

trans-unit.source: To add a delegate to the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that GetAddMethod returns.
trans-unit.target: Lägg till ett ombud händelsen genom att anropa den <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>metod för den <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>som returnerar GetAddMethod.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Skicka en <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract>som representerar delegaten till den `parameters` parametern <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> som representerar den metod som användes för att lägga till en händelsehanterare delegera till händelsen som den här <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifierar.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar information om händelsen som den här <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifierar.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData> structure includes the name of the event and the type that declares the event.
trans-unit.target: Informationen som ges av den <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData>strukturen innehåller namnet på händelsen och den typ som deklarerar händelsen.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData"></xref> that provides information about the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData"> </xref> som ger information om händelsen som den här <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifierar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar den metod som användes för att ta bort en händelsehanterare delegera från händelsen som den här <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifierar.

trans-unit.source: To remove a delegate from the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that GetRemoveMethod returns.
trans-unit.target: Ta bort en delegat händelsen genom att anropa den <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>metod för den <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>som returnerar GetRemoveMethod.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Skicka en <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract>som representerar delegaten till den `parameters` parametern <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> som representerar den metod som användes för att ta bort en händelsehanterare delegera från händelsen som den här <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"> </xref> identifierar.
